description:
A visitor named Reina is killed at Haido Central Hospital. The cause of death is asphyxiation caused by cyanide. Inspector Megure suspects hospital patient Juri and visitors Katsuki and Tokie, who were drinking tea with the victim.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Un thé sous haute tension (1re partie)
ギスギスしたお茶会 (前編)
